title: 3rd gen Specialized Turbo Levo eMTB gets more shred-worthy, more adjustable
content:
Human amplification takes a step forward with the all-new Specialized Turbo Levo v3 e-mountain bike. Bringing all the “4x you” power of the prior generation, the latest model adds a lot more adjustability, mixed wheel size, better durability, and awesome new Mission Control features. We’ve been testing this for the past couple months, and it’s […]

The post 3rd gen Specialized Turbo Levo eMTB gets more shred-worthy, more adjustable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
